description: This Strawberry Quick cocktail is a refreshing drink that features strawberry schnapps, Irish cream, and grenadine. It's perfect for those hot summer days when you just want something light and fruity to sip on!
name: Strawberry Quick

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail glass filled with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail glass filled with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Stir vigorously to mix all ingredients!
recipeInstructions.text: Stir vigorously to mix all ingredients!

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with strawberry or cherry if desired.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with strawberry or cherry if desired.
